text: mariyu karmapatram vari mundu uncabadinapudu, a aparadhulu, andulo unna danini cusi bhayapadatanni nivu custavu. Varu ila antaru: "Ayyo! Ma daurbhagyam, idemi grantham! E cinna visayanna gani, e pedda visayanni gani idi lekkapettakunda viduva lede!" Tamu cesindanta varu tama eduta pondutaru. Ni prabhuvu evvariki an'yayam ceyadu
